00035 #ifndef __OPENPCD_H__
00036 #define __OPENPCD_H__
00037 
00038 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00039 extern "C" {
00040 #endif/*__cplusplus*/
00041 
00042 #define EXPORT_CONVENTION __stdcall
00043 #ifdef  BUILD_DLL
00044 /* DLL export */
00045 #define EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00046 #else
00047 /* EXE import */
00048 #define EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00049 #endif /*BUILD_DLL*/
00050 
00051 #define PCDERROR_NONE                    0
00052 #define PCDERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER      -1
00053 #define PCDERROR_KEY_FORMAT             -2
00054 #define PCDERROR_KEY_AUTH               -3
00055 #define PCDERROR_NO_CARD_FOUND          -4
00056 #define PCDERROR_LAYER2_INIT            -5
00057 #define PCDERROR_LAYER2_OPEN            -6
00058 #define PCDERROR_LAYER3_INIT            -7
00059 #define PCDERROR_LAYER3_OPEN            -8
00060 #define PCDERROR_SELECT                 -9
00061 #define PCDERROR_READ_FAILED            -10
00062 #define PCDERROR_WRITE_FAILED           -11
00063 #define PCDERROR_CLOSED                 -12
00064 #define PCDERROR_NO_READER              -13
00065 #define PCDERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY          -14
00066 #define PCDERROR_READER_VERSION         -15
00067 
00068 #define PCDAUTH_KEY_LENGTH 6
00069 #define PCDAUTH_KEYID_1A 0
00070 #define PCDAUTH_KEYID_1B 1
00071 
00072 typedef void* MIFARE_HANDLE;
00073 
00074 /*************************************************************************/
00075 /*                                                                       */
00076 /* Six steps for reading/writing to MIFARE cards                         */
00077 /*                                                                       */
00078 /*************************************************************************/
00079 
00080 /*  Step 1. open reader
00081 
00082     supply the address of your handle variable to retrieve a handle
00083     to the current reader.
00084  */
00085 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_open_reader(MIFARE_HANDLE *handle);
00086 
00087 /*  Step 2. set MIFARE classic key
00088 
00089     if your key differs from the default Infineon key (6*0xFF), you can
00090     supply a different key here. The key size is PCDAUTH_KEY_LENGTH bytes.
00091     You can chose to set key_id to PCDAUTH_KEYID_1A or *_1B.
00092  */
00093 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_set_key(MIFARE_HANDLE handle,unsigned int key_id,const void* key);
00094 
00095 /*  Step 3. select card
00096     
00097     start the anticollosion to select a card in the reader field - retry if
00098     it fails. Currently supports only on card in the readerv field.
00099  */
00100 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_select_card(MIFARE_HANDLE handle);
00101 
00102 /*  Step 4. read/write card
00103     
00104     read, write from the selected card - specify the page and supply up to
00105     16 bytes of payload
00106  */
00107 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_read(MIFARE_HANDLE handle,int page, void* data, int len);
00108 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_write(MIFARE_HANDLE handle,int page,const void *data,int len);
00109 
00110 /*  Step 5. deselect card when done
00111  */
00112 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_deselect_card(MIFARE_HANDLE handle);
00113 
00114 /*  Step 6. close reader after deselected card
00115  */
00116 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_close_reader(MIFARE_HANDLE handle);
00117 
00118 
00119 /*************************************************************************/
00120 /*                                                                       */
00121 /* Support functions                                                     */
00122 /*                                                                       */
00123 /*************************************************************************/
00124 
00125 /*  openpcd_get_error_text:
00126 
00127     Used for converting the error code into a string
00128  */
00129 EXPORT char* EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_get_error_text(int error);
00130 
00131 
00132 /*  openpcd_get_card_id:
00133 
00134     Get the card id of a selected RFID card
00135  */
00136 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_get_card_id(MIFARE_HANDLE handle,unsigned int *uid);
00137 
00138 /*  openpcd_get_api_version:
00139 
00140     Get the USB api version of the reader
00141  */
00142 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_get_api_version(MIFARE_HANDLE handle,unsigned int *version);
00143 
00144 /*  openpcd_reset_reader:
00145 
00146     Reset the attached reader
00147  */
00148 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_reset_reader(MIFARE_HANDLE handle);
00149 
00150 /*  openpcd_get_environment
00151 
00152     Store the given data to the nonvolatile reader flash
00153     Returns read data count at index or error code
00154  */
00155 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_get_environment(
00156     MIFARE_HANDLE handle,
00157     unsigned char count,
00158     unsigned char* data    
00159 );
00160     
00161 /*  openpcd_set_environment
00162 
00163     Read data from nonvolatile reader flash
00164     Returns written data count at index or error code
00165  */
00166 EXPORT int EXPORT_CONVENTION openpcd_set_environment(
00167     MIFARE_HANDLE handle,
00168     unsigned char count,
00169     const unsigned char* data    
00170 );
00171 
00172 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00173 }
00174 #endif/*__cplusplus*/
00175 #endif/*__OPENPCD_H__*/
